LanguageData.AIRobot_MinifiedRechargeStation.label: Base Station
LanguageData.AIRobot_Hauler.description: This is a HaulBot. It carries your purchases home and even lifts your new piano up into your room on the 20th floor.
LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Hauler.label: HaulBot Station™
LanguageData.AIRobot_Cleaner.description: This is a JanitorBot. It will clean your base, hide your valuables!.
LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Cleaner.label: JanitorBot Station™
LanguageData.AIRobot_Crafter.description: This is a CraftBot. Even though it feels no emotions, it seems incredibly sad about working for you.
LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Crafter.label: CraftBot Station™
LanguageData.AIRobot_Doctor.description: This is a MedBot. Looks like it has lots of saws and needles, not sure if torture device or doctor.
LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Doctor.label: MedBot Station™
LanguageData.AIRobot_Cook.description: This is a CookBot. Spatulas and knives (possibly katanas) included!
LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Cook.label: CookBot Station™
LanguageData.AIRobot_Grower.description: This is a HydroponicsBot. Includes a sprinkler for that ASMR effect.
LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Grower.label: HydroponicsBot Station™
LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Grower.descripti: This station holds a HydroponicsBot. Maybe!
LanguageData.AIRobot_Miner.description: This is a MinerBot. What a GoldDigger!
LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Miner.label: MinerBot Station™
LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Miner.descriptio: This station holds a MinerBot. Unless it dug itself out of there.
